unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!**
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!

unnormalised: Hey Influencer gang! Tired of generic follower analytics? Good news! Local startup, "InsightsRaho," is shaking things up.
normalised: Hey Influencer gang! Tired of generic follower analytics? Good news! Local startup, "InsightsRaho," is shaking things up.

unnormalised: They're offering hyper-localized analytics, diving deep into your Indian audience. Think pinpointing engagement rates in specific pin codes, like Connaught Place or Bandra. No more vague data!
normalised: They're offering hyper-localized analytics, diving deep into your Indian audience. Think pinpointing engagement rates in specific pin codes, like Connaught Place or Bandra. No more vague data!

unnormalised: Imagine knowing exactly which age group in Kerala is vibing with your Onam recipes!
normalised: Imagine knowing exactly which age group in Kerala is vibing with your Onam recipes!

unnormalised: InsightsRaho also tracks sentiment around trending topics related to Indian festivals and dishes, like biryani. Is your spicy take getting love or hate? Now you'll know!
normalised: InsightsRaho also tracks sentiment around trending topics related to Indian festivals and dishes, like biryani. Is your spicy take getting love or hate? Now you will know!

unnormalised: Early users are seeing a 20% jump in engagement, pretty sweet, right?
normalised: Early users are seeing a twenty percent jump in engagement, pretty sweet, right?

unnormalised: CEO Priya Sharma mentioned, "We want to empower Indian creators to truly understand their audience, down to the last chai-loving detail!"
normalised: Chief Executive Officer Priya Sharma mentioned, "We want to empower Indian creators to truly understand their audience, down to the last chai-loving detail!"

unnormalised: They're offering a free trial for the next 7 days. Go check them out and level up your influencer game! Don’t miss the early bird offer on their annual plan priced at Rs. 4999.
normalised: They're offering a free trial for the next seven days. Go check them out and level up your influencer game! Don’t miss the early bird offer on their annual plan priced at rupees four thousand nine hundred and ninety nine.
